My Thoughts

This site contains random items I work on or have been thinking about. I'll try to keep this updated as much as possible. Dates will be included on each post and it's my hope that I can get a short YouTube video for each as well.

The left panel has links to the content based on categories.

Outdoors:

Last year I worked on spending more time outdoors. We purchased a small camper to help with travel. This section covers that story of my life.

Technology:

My life is spent in all sorts of technologies. From cryptocurrency to digital identities. This section will contain all of this work.

Projects:

Much of my time is spent working on side projects. Could be something around the house or helping my boys. This section will document those efforts.

Hope you enjoy it!
